description:
## Argo CD Overview

### The Argo CD dashboard gives you broad visibility into your Argo CD Clusters

This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your Argo CD clusters so that you can monitor the deployments, performance, and overall health of a cluster.

### Useful Links

- [Datadog Argo CD Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/argocd/)
- [Argo CD Official Documentation](https://argo-cd.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)
- [Monitoring Argo CD Blogpost](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/argo-cd-datadog/)

Clone this template dashboard to make changes and add your own graph widgets.
title: Argo CD Overview

definition.content:
This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your Argo CD clusters so that you can monitor the deployments, performance, and overall health of a cluster

Using the dashboard, you can monitor the health of
* Application Controller
* API Server
* Repository Server

### Useful Links
- [Datadog Argo CD Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/argocd/)
- [Argo CD Official Documentation](https://argo-cd.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)
- [Monitor Argo CD Blogpost](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/argo-cd-datadog/)

definition.title: Host Reporting Argo CD Metrics by Cluster
Applications Not in Sync by Sync_Status & Host
Number of Non Successful Application Syncs
Application Controller Memory Usage by Cluster
Application Controller Goroutines Usage by Cluster
Application Controller CPU Time by Cluster
Count of Application Reconciliation by Duration Bounds
Count of Service Requests by Service
API Server Memory Usage by Cluster
API Server Goroutines Usage by Cluster
API Server CPU Time by Cluster
Repository Server Memory Usage by Cluster
